amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to make technical, conforming, and clarifying changes throughout the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (MO) amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Graves (MO).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (MO) amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
